div1.head: Letter from J. Christian Bay to Philip Showalter Hench, January 10, 1941
div1.opener:
THE JOHN CRERAR LIBRARY
86 East Randolph Street
Chicago, Jan. 10, 1941.
J. Christian Bay,
Librarian
Randall French,
Assistant Librarian
Dr. P. S. Hench,
Mayo Clinic,
Rochester, Minn.
Dear Dr. Hench:
div1.p:
Please retain the book which
you now have as long as it is
needed for the purpose of your
work.
